narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Apt Foundation, INC is a Clinic/Center, Methadone Clinic provider based in New Haven, CT. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $18.9M in Medicaid payments across 104K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $18.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
